700381f-a.title: Bronx: 254th Street (West) - Post Road
700381f-a.text:
225 West 254th Street, at the N.W. corner of Post Road, showing the
Samler House, a pre-Revolutionary landmark in Dutch architecture. The
house is still inhabited at this date (1937).
1911.
Gift of Randall Comfort.
CREDIT LINE IMPERATIVE ON ALL REPRODUCTIONS.
